episodes.title: They Controlled My Life for 10 Years 👀 Then I Built My Own!! (Part 1)
episodes.description:
At 20, I entered a cult.
At 30, I left — no friends, no family, no roadmap.

This is the raw, unfiltered truth of how I got there, what it took from me, and how I turned the aftermath into fuel to build the life I was always meant to live.

I gave up basketball. Missed milestones. Lost time.
But after leaving, everything changed.

I didn’t just survive — I used the experience to build two businesses, earn three degrees, start a fashion label, publish a book, and create the N.I.C.E.™ method: a tool to help anyone go from stuck → successful.

I'm not fully healed — but I’m here.
This channel is for those who feel behind, confused, or like they lost years to something that wasn’t really them.

Let’s get active. Let’s get clear. Let’s get free.

Timestamp:
0:00–0:30 Intro
0:30–1:40 Cult & Experience
1:40–2:25 Post Cult
2:25–4:45 About the Channel

✅ Subscribe if you’ve ever felt stuck or behind — you’re not alone.

episodes.title: Escaping a Cult: How I Built My Life From Scratch (Part 2)
episodes.description:
Part 2 of my story.

After leaving the cult, I had nothing. Literally started from zero. No support system. No clue how to “do life.”

But urgency is a hell of a motivator.

I knew I was behind — so I moved fast.
I got my third degree. Built two brands. Became an author. Launched a fashion label.

Looking back, I realized I wasn’t just hustling randomly. I was following a pattern. That pattern became my method — the N.I.C.E.™ framework. It’s how I help others now:

✦ N = Narrative — rewrite your story
✦ I = Insight — find what you know that others don’t
✦ C = Connection — build community & confidence
✦ E = Execution — move with bold clarity

I’m not sharing this for sympathy. I’m sharing it to prove what’s possible.

If you’ve lost time… you can still catch up.
If you feel stuck… you can still move forward.

Let this be the sign you were waiting for.

Timestamp:
0:00 –1:49 How I got in the Cult
1:49–4:10 Experience in the Cult

5:29–6:30 Accomplishments after the Cult
